definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: It would be interesting to hear what their rationalizations are.
sentences.chinese: 聽聽他們合理化的做法也是一件蠻有趣味的事情。

sentences.english: Man is not a rational animal, but a rationalizing animal.
sentences.chinese: 人類並非理性的動物，而是善於合理化的動物。

sentences.english: The rationalization proposal about preservation the ginkgo seeds after harvest is suggested in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 並對廣東白果的採後保鮮提出合理化建議。

sentences.english: Overall, the employment structure is developing towards rationalization and optimization.
sentences.chinese: 總體上看，就業結構正朝着合理化與優化的方向發展。

sentences.english: The cardinal approach to the rationalization of PD is to realize the systematization of PD.
sentences.chinese: 物流合理化的根本途徑是實現物流的系統化。

sentences.english: Don't make emotional decisions and rationalize them afterward.
sentences.chinese: 不要做情緒性的決策，然後事後再想辦法將它合理化。

sentences.english: They ration-alized the food processing last year.
sentences.chinese: 他們去年對食品加工工序進行了合理化改革。

sentences.english: It also concludes the problems existing in the expansion of built-up area and gives some reasonable suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 並針對建成區擴展中存在的問題，提出了合理化建議。

sentences.english: But as you got older, you began to rationalize your confidence.
sentences.chinese: 但是你慢慢長大，開始讓自信合理化。

sentences.english: They’re covered up by assumptions and excuses and rationalisations.
sentences.chinese: 它們常常被設想，藉口或是合理化及掩蓋。

sentences.english: You have cleverly rationalized what the gurus and holy books have taught you.
sentences.chinese: 你很聰明地把古魯或者聖典上所教導的東西合理化了。

sentences.english: The optimized industrial structure is composed of the advancement and rationalization of structure.
sentences.chinese: 產業結構優化包括結構高級化和合理化兩個方面。

sentences.english: Rationalisation means increase of profit and reduction of cost.
sentences.chinese: 合理化意味着提高效益和降低成本。

sentences.english: Engage in labour emulation and rationalization proposals.
sentences.chinese: 開展勞動競賽和合理化建議活動。

sentences.english: One, for example, is we have a remarkable capacity for rationalization.
sentences.chinese: 例如，其一，每個人都具有非凡的合理化能力。

sentences.english: They're smart and so they rationalize what they're doing.
sentences.chinese: 他們很聰明因此他們合理化自己的行爲。
